metadata.name: Reverie
metadata.description:
This photo was taken during my expedition to a interior viollage of Purulia, West Bengal, India. 
while capturing the photo of an old women wo was cooking suddenly I saw a set of curious eyes peeping through a broken thach door.
Those eyes were so inquisitive and the light was so beautiful that I was forced to turn my camera towards the boy, and i was just able to capture only one photo before the boy ran away.

Edition      : 1/1 GENESIS
Year           : 2018
Camera    : Canon 5D Mark2
Lens          : 50mm prime
Location  : West Bengal, India

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited.
